<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/509f8031b2b347c033327ef33f3e5573a0595dbc|patch 8.2.1738: Mac: str2float() recognizes comma instead of decimal …>
patch 8.2.1738: Mac: str2float() recognizes comma instead of decimal point

Problem:    Mac: str2float() recognizes comma instead of decimal point.
Solution:   Set LC_NUMERIC to "C". (closes #7003)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1738: Mac: str2float() recognizes comma instead of decimal … · vim/vim@509f803
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1738: Mac: str2float() recognizes comma instead of decimal … · vim/vim@509f803
attachments.text: …point Problem: Mac: str2float() recognizes comma instead of decimal point. Solution: Set LC_NUMERIC to "C". (closes #7003)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/10476521f51d5902d191f2189307781fc48a3a16|patch 8.2.1737: cursor line highlight in popup window is not always u…>
patch 8.2.1737: cursor line highlight in popup window is not always updated

Problem:    Cursor line highlight in popup window is not always updated.
Solution:   Check if the cursor has moved. (closes #7010)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1737: cursor line highlight in popup window is not always u… · vim/vim@1047652
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1737: cursor line highlight in popup window is not always u… · vim/vim@1047652
attachments.text: …pdated Problem: Cursor line highlight in popup window is not always updated. Solution: Check if the cursor has moved. (closes #7010)
